fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player this night, instead of their own night action, they will do the best possible action for the benefit of their faction this night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The host will decide whats the best course of action for the Role based on all the info the Host has, For example, Killing/investigative Roles will target the most valuable enemy, Protective roles will prevent a kill where possible, and so on.
- You may not self-target
- This will fail if the target is Control immune.
- Your target will know who they targeted and will be notified that they were helped by a Strategist.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Make sure the good faction loses.
